Sites picked arbitrarily from the 100 host candidates, to include
some commercial/cultural/political/geographic variety:

www.weborama.fr
www.puppynames.com
www.nokia.fi
www.goteborg.se
www.health.gov
www.aircanada.ca
www.amnh.org
www.earthday.net
www.anselm.edu

Please run HTTrack and Mercator against these seeds, with the
same (full-hostname, www.NAME.DOM) filtering as before. 

I'll be running Heritrix against them starting later this evening.

- Gordon
